title: Raspberry Pi Imager Gets New Tabbed OS Customization UI, Raspberry Pi 5 Support
description:
Raspberry Pi Imager 1.8.1 is now available for download with a new tabbed UI for OS customization, Raspberry Pi 5 support, a new Home screen, and other changes.

The post Raspberry Pi Imager Gets New Tabbed OS Customization UI, Raspberry Pi 5 Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Geany 2.0 Open-Source IDE Released with UI Improvements, Initial Meson Support
description:
Geany 2.0 open-source IDE is now available for download with initial support for the Meson build system, interface improvements, and more.

title: KDE Frameworks 5.111 Is Out and KDE Plasma 6 Now Has a Release Schedule
description:
KDE Frameworks 5.111 software suite is now available with various bug fixes and the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment has been slated for release on February 28th, 2024.

The post KDE Frameworks 5.111 Is Out and KDE Plasma 6 Now Has a Release Schedule appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
